value.title: StarCraft 2: EASY Zerg Build Order! (In Depth!)
value.excerpt: In this video I cover a relatively easy build order for new or returning Zerg players for StarCraft 2: Heart of the Swarm. value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Feinting Attacks" - A feint is where you give the impression of attacking in one place where its fake or just a small distraction from the real thrust of your attack. Examples: Using empty drops or hallucinations to pull your opponent out of position!  Send submissions to
